verses.1: “Na gen uh thu khempeuh ka muh sa vive hi a, ka bil-in ka zakzak sa, ka theihtheih sa thu ahi hi.
verses.2: Noteʼ theih khempeuh, kei zong ka thei hi. Note khempeuh sangin ka neu zaw tuan het kei hi.
verses.3: Ahi zongin note tawh kam a kinial hi loin, Pasian tawh a kinial ka hi hi. Pasian tawh hih ka thu ka kinial nuam hi.
verses.4: Note in na haina uh zuau thu tawh na melh uh a, kuamah a damsak zo lo zato siam a kinei mite tawh na kibang uh hi.
verses.5: Pau het loin om hi le-uhcin, mipil mah hong kisa zaw ding hi.
verses.6: “Tu-in ka thugen hong ngai unla, ka gen laitakin limtak ngai un.
verses.7: Pasianʼ min dingin thuman lo genin, ama adingin zuau thu gensak ding na hi uh hiam?
verses.8: Pasian angvan dinga, ama ading gensak ding na hi uh hiam?
verses.9: Pasian in limtakin note hong en tel leh noteʼ sungah hoihna mu ding ahi hiam? Mihingte na khem bangun Pasian a khem thei dingin kingaihsun na hi uh hiam?
verses.10: A simthamin angvanna na zat uh leh amah in note hong taii taktak ding hi.
verses.11: Ama vangliatna in note hong lausak dinga, note tungah amah kihtakna hong tung ding hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.12: Na thugente uh vut khu bang hi lel a, na siksante uh leivui bang hi lel hi.
verses.13: Pau kei unla, kei, thu hong gensak dih un; a piang peuhpeuh a piang hi mai hen.
verses.14: “Ka nuntakna pia ngamin, ka nuntakna ka ap ngam hi.
verses.15: Pasian in kei hong that mah taleh zong, phamawh ka sa kei hi. Ahi zongin ama mai ah ka thu ka gen veve ding hi.
verses.16: Pasianʼ mai ah migilote pai ngam lo uh ahih manin, ka hanna pen ka gualzawhna hi ding hi.
verses.17: Ka thugente limtak ngai unla, ka lah telnate na za un.
verses.18: Ka thu a gen dingin a baih sa-in ka om a, thu ka zawh ding lamtak teltakin ka thei hi.
verses.19: “Pasian aw, keimah hong mawhsak ding na hi hiam? Nong mawhsak leh pau het loin a si dingin ka kiging hi.
verses.20: Thu nih kong ngen hi, ka hong nget hong pia in. Tua ciangin nang tungah bangmah kong im kei ding hi.
verses.21: Kei tungah gim hong pia nawn kei inla, hih bang launa hong thuaksak nawn kei in.
verses.22: Pasian aw, hong hopih masa in, kong dawng ding hi. Kei, thu hong gensak inla, nangmah in hong dawng in.
verses.23: Ka mawhna ka khialhna bangzah pha ahi hiam? Ka mawh ka khialhna teng hong theisak in.
verses.24: “Bang hangin kei hong peel a, gal bangin hong ngaihsun na hi hiam?
verses.25: Bang hangin keimah lausak ding hanciam na hi hiam? Kei, singteh bang lel hi lo ka hi hiam? Anvai them khat galin do ding na hi hiam?
verses.26: “Nangmah in kei tungah thusiapi nong zong a, ka neu lai huna ka gamtatna nangawn tawh nong mawhsak hi.
verses.27: Nangmah in ka khe sikkol nong bulh a, ka kalsuanna khempeuh le ka khekhap nangawn na en tel hi.
verses.28: Tua huhau-in singmuat bangin ka puk a, nget in a nek puan bangin ka zan gawp hi.
